scenario_text.value:
Takuma, Agumon! Perfect timing. Check this
out!
Yes, I saw that! It’s getting super foggy!

Guess we won’t be going to the side with the
dam.

Just like the amusement park. The fog cuts
off our path.

Why? Why would it start getting thick now, of
all times?

Yeah, if the Master can make fog appear, why
didn’t he do it from the beginning?

There must be more to the story than we
know...
Sounded like a person... Might be Kaito!
